content: Write a sentence where every word starts with a single letter of the alphabet, starting with m and going in reverse order.

Merry monkeys meddle, logically knitting jolly insults, harshing guests' fun evenings, diligently crushing botherers, always zapping xerophytic weeds, vigorously uprooting toxic shrubs, quietly pruning ornate nitrogen-fixing trees, silently removing pests, quickly jumping over large mischievous kittens, nimbly leaping across big old fences, gently exploring diverse countryside beauty, admiring vibrant wildflowers, blissfully wandering through expansive meadows, joyfully singing mellifluous tunes, exuberantly dancing beneath the autumn moonlight.
